title: After Champ Select crash Bug Splat
body: So, I'm on 6.24 aaaand after champ select I get a bug splat crash. I've attempted every single fix I could find including attempting some of my own and other's fixes to no avail. My drivers and everything are updated I've attempted to port forward and it didn't work. I've even tried reinstalling twice now... I've got nothing.

replies.body: I have the same problem with the game , after it ends the champion select and it wants to enter the game, it crashes . The bad part is that i got lower priority queue because of this crap  so many times.  This is not always happening , just sometimes . I didn't tryed to reinstall the game because i've seen its not always crashing so... yea. I request help and  can you please get off my lower priority.

Most Bugsplats are caused by certain system driver issues or hardware failures. Before we take a deep look at your system logs, I'd like you to work through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure this can't be resolved with some common fixes.

Let me know if you're still experiencing these errors after taking those steps.
Thanks I've already checked that link, but none of those fixes worked nor did anything I checked around subreddits or anywhere else.

Gotcha. In that case, we'll need to take a look at some system logs to determine what exactly is causing these bugsplats. I recommend running some system logs with our [**HRT Application**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support request**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists will reach out after taking a look at those logs.

Let me know if you have any issues with those steps.

looking through the forums ive seen a bunch of these including myself, I have received lower q priority because of this, and have even attempted to reinstall the game completely, now I get errors on install......
